content: crochet your own front opening hot water bottle cover using this easy to follow pattern the pattern can be viewed here https //www cosyrosieuk co uk/free-crochet-hot-water-bottle-cover-pattern along with the full video tutorial the pattern is worked in 4 parts which are then crocheted together to fit a standard bottle hook & other materials us size j/10 6 0mm crochet hook yarn needle skill level easy sizes/finished measurements body 8 ½ /22 cm x 12 /30 cm ribbing 2 ½ /6 cm tall gauge 11 sts and 8 row in half_double_crochet = 4 /10 cm
